mapper.insert: insert into artist(artistname, artisttype, artistgenre, artistimg, userNumber) values(#{artistName}, #{artistType}, #{artistGenre}, #{artistImg}, #{userNumber})
mapper.select: select artistnumber from artist where artistname=#{artistName}
select artistnumber, artistname, artisttype, artistgenre, artistimg from artist where userNumber=#{userNumber}
select artist_artistnumber from album where artist_artistnumber=#{artistNumber}
